sense.name: demand payment
sense.examples: For one thing, the company billed him for two trunk lines when he only wanted one. They just kept billing me at a non-ATT consumer rate. Why are you billing me for more sales tax? Opri billed her services out at $475 an hour.

sense.name: describe or advertise something or someone
sense.commentary: Syntax Is: NP1[agent] BILL NP2[theme] as NP3[attribute]
sense.examples: In times past, they would have billed her as a chanteuse. We're billing it as the easiest way to send invoices online.
